means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 希契 Hick的变体

sentence.Network_en: The shooting of The Maltese Falcon proceeded without a hitch.
sentence.Network_cn: 《马耳他之鹰》的拍摄进展顺利。

sentence.Network_en: The five-hour operation went without a hitch.
sentence.Network_cn: 5小时的手术进行得非常顺利。

sentence.Network_en: All the candidates are able to answer the questions without any hitch.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有报考者都能对答如流.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在看全民情敌(HITCH),想如果真的有这样的人是不是不论喜欢上谁都能让对方也喜欢上自己呀。如果真是这样的话真的是全民情敌呀! …
爱情片 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... 《乱世佳人》( Gone With the Wind) 《全民情圣》( Hitch) 《瓶中信》( Message in a Bottle).
by TEAR - GRE考试综合论坛寄托家园留学论坛... ... feeble.(  虚弱的，无力的) hitched( 拴住) foremost( 最初的).
大学英语精读单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... wagon n. 四轮运货马(牛) 车 hitch vi. 钩住， 拴住， 套住 mare n. 母马， 母驴.

list.abs: ...7、卷结：又称墨水结。在两方向负荷相同时使用。组合木材固定的时候用。, 8、双套结(clove hitch)：又称丁香结。可用于固定，也用于攀登和下降。, 9、绳头结：又称艾曼斯结。结组第一人与最后一人用于绳索与安全带连接处。也可用于保护绳的支点上。.
1、单环结(munter hitch)：又称意大利半扣(Italian hitch)。用于沿主绳快速下降时的速度控制。
最新俚语293条(2) ... get a foot in the door 获得立足点 get hitched 结婚 get off on the wrong foot 第一印象不佳.
航海及海运专业英语词汇(M1) ... magnitude ratio 光比 magnus hitch 天幕结 Magyat Szabvany 匈牙利国家标准.

phrase.cizu_name: hitch one's wagon to a star

jx.jx_en_mean: try to succeed by forming a relationship with someone who is already successful
jx.jx_cn_mean: 攀龙附凤；试图靠沾别人的光而成功

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'lift up with a jerk'): of unknown origin

entry.def: A hitch is a slight problem or difficulty which causes a short delay.

example.ex: After some technical hitches the show finally got under way...
example.tran: 一些小技术故障解决后，演出终于开始了。

example.ex: The five-hour operation went without a hitch.
example.tran: 5小时的手术进行得非常顺利。

entry.def: If you hitch ,hitch a lift, or hitch a ride, you hitchhike.

example.ex: There was no garage in sight, so I hitched a lift into town...
example.tran: 放眼望去看不到修车厂，所以我就搭顺风车进了城。

example.ex: Jean-Phillippe had hitched all over Europe in the 1960s.
example.tran: 让－菲利普在20世纪60年代曾搭便车游遍欧洲。

entry.def: If you hitch something to something else, you hook it or fasten it there.

example.ex: Last night we hitched the horse to the cart and moved here.
example.tran: 昨晚我们套上马车，拉着东西搬到了这里。

entry.def: If you get hitched, you get married.

example.ex: The report shows that fewer couples are getting hitched.
example.tran: 报告显示，结婚的人数呈下降趋势。

means.word_mean: 1. a period of time spent in military service
2. the state of inactivity following an interruption;

sentences.sentence: "during the halt he got some lunch"
"the momentary stay enabled him to escape the blow"
"he spent the entire stop in his seat"

means.word_mean: 4. a connection between a vehicle and the load that it pulls
5. a knot that can be undone by pulling against the strain that holds it
6. any obstruction that impedes or is burdensome
7. the uneven manner of walking that results from an injured leg
2. walk impeded by some physical limitation or injury;

sentences.sentence: "The old woman hobbles down to the store every day"

means.word_mean: 3. jump vertically, with legs stiff and back arched;
4. travel by getting free rides from motorists
5. connect to a vehicle: "hitch the trailer to the car"

auth_sentence.content: It is perhaps surprising that hitch-hiking been in decline.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is perhaps surprising that hitch-hiking been in decline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is perhaps surprising that hitch-hiking been in decline.

auth_sentence.content: The only hitch is that you'll get the flu.
auth_sentence.res_content: The only hitch is that you'll get the flu.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The only hitch is that you'll get the flu.

auth_sentence.content: The service passed off without a hitch.
auth_sentence.res_content: The service passed off without a hitch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The service passed off without a hitch.

means.word_mean: (免费)搭乘他人之车; 搭便车

sentences.en: We hitched a ride in a truck yesterday.
sentences.cn: 我们昨天顺便搭乘了一辆卡车。

means.word_mean: (用环、钩等)套住, 钩住(某物)

sentences.en: He hitched the horse's rope over the pole.
sentences.cn: 他把马缰绳拴在柱子上。

jushi.english: If we hitch it'll keep the costs down.
jushi.chinese: 如果我们搭免费车，那就会降低费用。

jushi.english: Can I hitch a ride with you?
jushi.chinese: 我可以顺路搭乘你的车吗?

jushi.english: He hitched his donkey to a tree.
jushi.chinese: 他把他的驴拴到一棵树上。
